mapper.select: select left(pro_location,2) as loc_sub,pro_idx,pro_name,pro_contents,pro_photo_01,pro_photo_02,pro_photo_03,pro_regdate,pro_location,pro_cnt,mem_idx,bra_idx from `exchange`.product order by pro_regdate desc

select * from `exchange`.`product` inner join `exchange`.brand on product.bra_idx=brand.bra_idx inner join `exchange`.second_category on brand.sec_idx = second_category.sec_idx inner join `exchange`.first_category on second_category.fir_idx = first_category.fir_idx where pro_idx=#{pro_idx};

SELECT `member`.`mem_idx`, `member`.`mem_id`,`member`.`mem_pw`,`member`.`mem_name`,`member`.`mem_birth`,`member`.`mem_nickname`,`member`.`mem_phone`,`member`.`mem_email`,`member`.`mem_address`,`member`.`mem_photo`,`member`.`mem_score` FROM `exchange`.`product` inner join `exchange`.`member` on product.mem_idx = member.mem_idx where product.pro_idx=#{pro_idx}
select * from `exchange`.`product` where pro_location like CONCAT('%',#{pro_location},'%')
select * from `exchange`.`product` where pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{pro_name},'%')
select * from `exchange`.`product` where pro_hash like CONCAT('%',#{pro_hash},'%')
